class_notes: This is a synchronous online class.  HPM students only.
course_description: Prerequisites: HPM 501, HPM 510, HPM 521, HPM 522, HPM 523, HPM 561 or 557 and HPM 576. This class will teach students how to conduct public health policy analyses that examine options to address emerging issues, conduct analysis of the options and communicate recommendations.
prerequisites: This class is for students enrolled in the HPM program only.
sections: Class Nbr: 4533, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 9:15a-12:05p, Instructor: Thorpe/Boualam, Status: Open
